00020 // To enforce a certain string encoding use any of
00021 //#define ILB_STRING_UTF8
00022 //#define ILB_STRING_UTF16
00023 //#define ILB_STRING_UTF32
00024 //#define ILB_STRING_ANSI
00025 
00029 typedef enum {
00034         ILB_SE_ANSI,
00038         ILB_SE_UTF8,
00039         
00043         ILB_SE_UTF16,
00044 
00049         ILB_SE_UTF32,
00050 } ILBStringEncoding;
00051 
00067 
00068 // Try to auto detect a string encoding if no was supplied
00069 #if !(defined(ILB_STRING_UTF8) || defined(ILB_STRING_UTF16) || defined(ILB_STRING_UTF32) || defined(ILB_STRING_ANSI))
00070 #if defined(WIN32)
00071 #ifdef UNICODE
00072 #define ILB_STRING_UTF16
00073 #else // UNICODE
00074 #define ILB_STRING_ANSI
00075 #endif // UNICODE
00076 #else // WIN32
00077 #define ILB_STRING_UTF8
00078 #endif // WIN32
00079 #endif // !(defined(ILB_STRING_UTF8) || defined(ILB_STRING_UTF16) || defined(ILB_STRING_UTF32) || defined(ILB_STRING_ANSI))
00080 
00081 
00085 typedef char ILBChar8;
00086 
00087 #if defined(WIN32)
00088 
00091 typedef wchar_t ILBChar16;
00092 #else // defined(WIN32)
00093 
00096 typedef unsigned short ILBChar16;
00097 #endif // defined(WIN32)
00098 
00104 typedef unsigned int ILBChar32;
00105 
00106 #ifdef beastapi_EXPORTS
00107 // This is for inside the API. By setting char type
00108 // to ILBDummyChar we guarantee that someone accidentially
00109 // converts strings or string constants to ILBString 
00110 // or ILBConstString without thinking about encoding
00111 struct ILBDummyChar {
00112         int unused;
00113 };
00114 
00120 typedef ILBDummyChar ILBCharType;
00122 #define ILB_STRING_ENCODING ILB_SE_ANSI
00123 
00124 #else // beastapi_EXPORTS
00125 
00126 #if defined(ILB_STRING_ANSI)
00127 typedef ILBChar8 ILBCharType;
00128 #if defined(WIN32)
00129 #define ILB_STRING_ENCODING ILB_SE_ANSI
00130 #else // WIN32
00131 #error ANSI strings only supported on Windows platforms
00132 #endif // WIN32
00133 #elif defined(ILB_STRING_UTF8)
00134 typedef ILBChar8 ILBCharType;
00135 #define ILB_STRING_ENCODING ILB_SE_UTF8
00136 #elif defined(ILB_STRING_UTF16)
00137 typedef ILBChar16 ILBCharType;
00138 #define ILB_STRING_ENCODING ILB_SE_UTF16
00139 #elif defined(ILB_STRING_UTF32)
00140 #error UTF32 currently not supported
00141 typedef ILBChar32 ILBCharType;
00142 #define ILB_STRING_ENCODING ILB_SE_UTF32
00143 #else
00144 #error No string type defined
00145 #endif //ILB_STRING_UTF8
00146 
00147 #endif //beastapi_EXPORTS
00148 
00149

00253

00262 typedef unsigned __int32 uint32;
00263

00272 typedef int64_t int64;

00274 typedef uint64_t uint64;
00275 typedef uint32 DWORD;
00276 #else
00277 #error Could not define int32 and friends.
00278 #endif

00284 typedef int32 ILBBool;

00290 typedef struct ILBVec2 {
00292         float x;
00294         float y;
00295 #ifdef __cplusplus
00296         ILBVec2() {}
00297         ILBVec2(float _x, float _y): x(_x), y(_y) {}
00298 #endif // __cplusplus
00299 } ILBVec2;
00300 
00304 typedef struct ILBVec2i {
00306         int x;
00308         int y;
00309 #ifdef __cplusplus
00310         ILBVec2i() {}
00311         ILBVec2i(int _x, int _y): x(_x), y(_y) {}
00312 #endif // __cplusplus
00313 } ILBVec2i;

00320 typedef struct ILBVec3 {
00322         float x;
00324         float y;
00326         float z;

00329         ILBVec3(float _x, float _y, float _z): x(_x), y(_y), z(_z) {}
00330 #endif // __cplusplus
00331 } ILBVec3;

00338 typedef struct ILBLinearRGB {
00340         float r;
00342         float g;
00344         float b;
00345 #ifdef __cplusplus
00346         ILBLinearRGB() {}
00347         ILBLinearRGB(float _r, float _g, float _b): r(_r), g(_g), b(_b) {}
00348 #endif // __cplusplus
00349 } ILBLinearRGB;

00356 typedef struct ILBLinearRGBA {

00360         float g;

00367         ILBLinearRGBA(float _r, float _g, float _b, float _a): r(_r), g(_g), b(_b), a(_a) {}
00368 #endif // __cplusplus
00369 } ILBLinearRGBA;

00390 /*
00391  * Macro to define handle types.
00392  * Inspired by windows headers
00393  */
00394 #define ILB_DECLARE_HANDLE(name) struct name##__{int unused;}; typedef struct name##__ *name;

00552 /*
00553  * Setup for getting functions exported or imported from the DLL
00554  * on windows
00555  */
00556 #ifdef WIN32
00557 #ifdef beastapi_EXPORTS
00558 #define ILB_DLL_FUNCTION __declspec(dllexport)
00559 #else
00560 #define ILB_DLL_FUNCTION __declspec(dllimport)
00561 #endif // beastapi_EXPORTS
00562 #else // WIN32
00563 #define ILB_DLL_FUNCTION 
00564 #endif // WIN32
00565 
00566 #ifdef WIN32
00567 typedef void* ILBFileHandle;
00568 #define ILB_INVALID_FILE_HANDLE ((void*)(((unsigned char*)(0)) - 1))
00569 #else // WIN32
00570 typedef int32 ILBFileHandle;
00571 #define ILB_INVALID_FILE_HANDLE -1
00572 #endif // WIN32
00573 
00574 #endif //BEASTAPITYPES_H
